verbs.description: After a week 's worth of [V: scrambling] , the establishment media finally found a face around which to frame their anti - Trump political coverage of the aftermath of Hurricane Maria 's devastating impact upon the island of Puerto Rico . That face , of course , is San Juan Mayor Carmen Yulín Cruz . But as always , one must be watchful for what is missing from a report - and this sudden lionization of Mayor Cruz is no exception .
